contributors.title: Ministry of Finance of the Dominican Republic
DGCP - General Directorate of Public Procurement of the Dominican Republic
Treasury Investment Budget Information / SNIP - National Public Investment System, Ministry of Economy, Planning and Development (MEPyD)

sources.title: Presupuesto relacionado a proyectos de inversion

resources.name: presupuesto-de-inversion
resources.title: General Budget Information on Investment

title_translations.es: Información del Presupuesto General en Inversión

resources.description: This set contains information on the general budget of the nation focused on investment.

description_translations.es: Este conjunto contiene la informacion del presupuesto general de la nacion enfocado en inversion

fields.name: Año
fields.description: The year to which the information recorded in the database corresponds.

fields.name: CodigoInstitucion
fields.description: The unique code that identifies an institution within the system or set of institutions.

fields.name: Institucion
fields.description: Name or identification of the institution to which the registered information belongs.

fields.name: TipoGasto
fields.description: Category that classifies the expense according to its nature or purpose.

fields.name: CodigoFuenteDeFinanciamiento
fields.description: Code that identifies the source of financing the expense.

fields.name: FuenteDeFinanciamiento
fields.description: Description or identification of the source of financing the expense.

fields.name: CodigoFuenteEspecifica
fields.description: Specific code that identifies the detailed financing source.

fields.name: FuenteEspecifica
fields.description: Detailed description or specific identification of the funding source.

fields.name: CodigoOrganismoFinanciador
fields.description: Code that identifies the organization that provides the financing.

fields.name: OrganismoFinanciador
fields.description: Name or identification of the organization providing the financing.

fields.name: CodigoPrograma
fields.description: Code that identifies a specific program.

fields.name: Programa
fields.description: Name or description of the program to which the expense is assigned.

fields.name: CodigoSubPrograma
fields.description: Code that identifies an applet within a program.

fields.name: SubPrograma
fields.description: Name or description of the subprogram to which the expense is assigned.

fields.name: CodigoSnip
fields.description: Code assigned by the National Public Investment System (SNIP) to identify a project.

fields.name: CodigoProyecto
fields.description: Code that identifies a specific project.

fields.name: Proyecto
fields.description: Name or description of the project to which the expense is assigned.

fields.name: CodigoActividadObra
fields.description: Code that identifies an activity or work within a project.

fields.name: ActividadObra
fields.description: Name or description of the activity or work to which the expense is assigned.

fields.name: CodigoGrupoDeGasto
fields.description: Code that classifies spending into predefined groups.

fields.name: Grupodegasto
fields.description: Description or name of the group to which the expense belongs.

fields.name: CodigoFinalidad
fields.description: Code that identifies the purpose of the expense.

fields.name: Finalidad
fields.description: Description or name of the purpose for which the expense is intended.

fields.name: CodigoObjetoDeGasto
fields.description: Code that identifies the specific object for which the expense is intended.

fields.name: ObjetoDeGasto
fields.description: Description or name of the object for which the expense is intended.

fields.name: Sector
fields.description: Sector to which the activity or work associated with the expense belongs.

fields.name: CodigoSubFuncion
fields.description: Code that identifies a subfunction within a function.

fields.name: SubFuncion
fields.description: Description or name of the subfunction associated with the expense.

fields.name: ValorAprobado
fields.description: Amount or value approved for the expense in the budget item.

fields.name: ValorVigente
fields.description: Amount or value currently in force for the expense in the budget item.

fields.name: ValorEjecutado
fields.description: Amount or value executed so far for the expense in the budget item.

fields.name: FechaActualizacionFuente
fields.description: Date the information in the data source was updated

resources.name: procesos-de-compras
resources.title: Information on Processes related to the General Investment Budget and public investment projects

title_translations.es: Información de Procesos relacionados al Presupuesto General en Inversion y los proyectos de inversión pública

resources.description: Information on Processes related to the General Investment Budget and public investment projects

description_translations.es: Este  conjunto de datos proporciona informacion de los Procesos que han sido relacionados con el presupuesto enfocado a inversison y los proyectos de inversion pública a traves de los formularios de gastos preventivos

fields.name: CodigoSnip
fields.description: Code assigned by the National Public Investment System (SNIP) to identify a specific project.

fields.name: NombreProyecto
fields.description: Name or title of the project to which the contract refers.

fields.name: CodigoProceso
fields.description: Code that identifies a specific process associated with the contract.

fields.name: DescripcionProceso
fields.description: Detailed description of the contracting process, including its terms, conditions and scope.

fields.name: Caratula
fields.description: Document that contains summary information about the contracting process, including relevant details such as the type of contract, the parties involved, etc.

fields.name: EstadoProceso
fields.description: Current status of the contracting process, for example: pending, in progress, awarded, canceled, etc.

fields.name: MontoEstimado
fields.description: Estimated amount or value for the contracting process.

fields.name: Modalidad
fields.description: Modality under which the contracting process is carried out, for example: public bidding, price competition, direct contracting, etc.

fields.name: UrlProceso
fields.description: URL or link that directs to the location of the online contracting process or its corresponding documentation

fields.name: Fuente
fields.description: Source from which the information about the hiring process was obtained.

fields.name: FechaActualizacionFuenteMH
fields.description: Date on which the information on the contracting process was updated according to the data source of the Ministry of Finance

fields.name: FechaActualizacionFuenteDGCP
fields.description: Date on which the information on the contracting process was updated according to the data source of the Public Procurement System (DGCP)

resources.name: contratos-de-compras
resources.title: Information on Contracts related to the General Investment Budget and public investment projects

title_translations.es: Información de Contratos relacionados al Presupuesto General en Inversion y los proyectos de inversión pública

resources.description: This data set provides information on contracts that have been related to the investment-focused budget and public investment projects through the committed expenditure forms.

description_translations.es: Este  conjunto de datos proporciona informacion de los contratos que han sido relacionados con el presupuesto enfocado a inversison y los proyectos de inversion pública a traves de los formularios de gastos comprometidos

fields.name: CodigoSnip
fields.description: Code assigned by the National Public Investment System (SNIP) to identify a specific project.

fields.name: NombreProyecto
fields.description: Name or title of the project to which the contract refers.

fields.name: CodigoProceso
fields.description: Code that identifies a specific process associated with the contract.

fields.name: CodigoContrato
fields.description: Unique code that identifies the contract within the system or set of contracts.

fields.name: DescripcionContrato
fields.description: Detailed description of the contract, including relevant terms and conditions.

fields.name: EstadoContrato
fields.description: Current status of the contract, for example: pending, in progress, completed, etc.

fields.name: MonedaContrato
fields.description: Type of currency used to express contract values.

fields.name: ValorContrato
fields.description: Amount or total value of the contract.

fields.name: CodigoProveedor
fields.description: Unique code that identifies the supplier associated with the contract.

fields.name: Proveedor
fields.description: Name or identification of the supplier with whom the contract was established.

fields.name: UrlContrato
fields.description: URL or link that directs to the location of the online contract or its corresponding documentation.

fields.name: Fuente
fields.description: Source from which the information about the contract was obtained.

fields.name: FechaActualizacionFuenteMH
fields.description: Date on which the information about the contract was updated according to the data source of the Ministry of Finance.

fields.name: FechaActualizacionFuenteDGCP
fields.description: Date on which information about the contract was updated according to the data source of the Public Procurement System (DGCP)

resources.name: presupuesto-relacionado-a-proyectos-de-inversion
resources.title: Information on the General Budget on Investment and Related Public Investment Projects

title_translations.es: Información del Presupuesto General en Inversión y Los Proyectos de Inversión Pública relacionados

resources.description: This data set provides information on the general budget of the Dominican Republic focused on Investment and relates public investment projects.

description_translations.es: Este  conjunto de datos proporciona informacion del presupuesto general de republica dominicana enfocado en Inversion y relaciona los proyectos de inversion publica

fields.name: AnioPresupuesto
fields.description: Year to which the budget or recorded budget information corresponds.

fields.name: CodigoInstitucion
fields.description: Unique code that identifies an institution within the system or set of institutions.

fields.name: Institucion
fields.description: Name or identification of the institution to which the recorded budget information belongs.

fields.name: CodigoFuente_de_Financiamiento
fields.description: Code that identifies the source of financing for the project.

fields.name: Fuente_de_Financiamiento
fields.description: Description or identification of the source of financing for the project.

fields.name: CodigoFuenteEspecifica
fields.description: Specific code that identifies the detailed financing source.

fields.name: FuenteEspecifica
fields.description: Detailed description or specific identification of the funding source.

fields.name: CodigoOrganismoFinanciador
fields.description: Code that identifies the organization that provides financing for the project.

fields.name: OrganismoFinanciador
fields.description: Name or identification of the agency providing financing for the project.

fields.name: CodigoFinalidad
fields.description: Code that identifies the purpose of the project.

fields.name: Finalidad
fields.description: Description or name of the purpose for which the project is intended.

fields.name: IdSector
fields.description: Unique identification of the sector to which the project belongs.

fields.name: NombreSector
fields.description: Name or description of the sector to which the project belongs.

fields.name: CodigoSubFuncion
fields.description: Code that identifies a subfunction within a function.

fields.name: SubFuncion
fields.description: Description or name of the subfunction associated with the project.

fields.name: CodigoSnip
fields.description: Code assigned by the National Public Investment System (SNIP) to identify a specific project.

fields.name: nombreproyecto
fields.description: Name or title of the project.

fields.name: objetivogeneral
fields.description: General description of the project objective.

fields.name: avancefinanciero
fields.description: Status or financial progress of the project.

fields.name: IdEstado
fields.description: Unique identification of the current status of the project.

fields.name: NombreEstado
fields.description: Name or description of the current status of the project.

fields.name: IdProyecto
fields.description: Unique project identification.

fields.name: ValorProyecto
fields.description: Total amount or value of the project.

fields.name: ValorFinanciado
fields.description: Amount or value financed for the project.

fields.name: ValorEjecutado
fields.description: Amount or value executed so far for the project.

fields.name: URLProyecto
fields.description: URL or link that directs to the online project location or its corresponding documentation.

fields.name: Fuente
fields.description: Source from which information about the project was obtained.

fields.name: FechaActualizacionFuenteMH
fields.description: Date on which information about the project was updated according to the data source of the Ministry of Finance.

fields.name: FechaActualizacionFuenteMEPyD
fields.description: Date on which information about the project was updated according to the data source of the Ministry of Economy, Planning and Development.
